sentences.en: " The magistrates are God - fearing gentlemen, but merciful overmuch -- that is a truth, " added a third autumnal matron.
sentences.cn: “ 那帮官老爷都是敬神的先生, 可惜慈悲心太重 —— 这可是真事, ” 第三个人老珠黄的婆娘补充说.
那个房间充满了秋季的阳光.

sentences.en: Deep autumn the colour impression of season red autumnal leaves.
sentences.cn: 流行色分金秋、氤氲、黑夜、清流四个系列. 深秋时节红叶的色彩印象.

sentences.en: He became a consummate painter of twilight, night time and autumnal scenes.
sentences.cn: 他成为一名画黄昏 、 夜晚和秋景的优秀画家.

sentences.en: Pale colours are much more in vogue than autumnal bronzes and coppers.
sentences.cn: 浅色比黄褐色和红棕色这些秋季色彩更流行。

sentences.en: The autumn does many is an autumnal rains.
The autumn is the autumnal winds spirit is great.
The autumnal breeze caused the heaped - up leaves to unpile.
sentences.cn: 秋风于堆起来的树叶散开了.

sentences.en: The Autumnal Equinox is the best time for wheat - sowing.
The hills were inflamed with autumnal tints.
The maple leaves are aflame with brilliant autumnal sunshine.
sentences.cn: 灿烂的秋光染红了枫叶.

sentences.en: The villages were blazoned with autumnal color.
The weather in September was positively autumnal.
sentences.cn: 九月的天气确实像秋天了.

sentences.en: We used shades of gold and green to give the room a fresh, autumnal look.
sentences.cn: 我们用金色和绿色的色调为房间平添了一种清爽的秋日感觉。

sentences.en: Will take from both a deep autumnal tone.
sentences.cn: 必从而取得深秋的音色.
